name: Rockin' Sidney
description: '''Sidney Simien''' (April 9, 1938 â€“ February 25, 1998), known professionally as '''Rockin' Sidney''', was an American [[Rhythm and blues|R&B]], [[zydeco]], and [[Soul music|soul]] musician who began recording in the late 1950s and continued performing until his death. He is best known for his 1985 single "[[My Toot-Toot]]", which reached top 20 on the ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]'' [[Hot Country Songs]] charts and earned him a [[Grammy Award]].
